about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Ambition Mica Ltd is one of the leading manufacturers of mid segment decorative laminates and door skins. They market laminates under brands like Antique, Art Lam, Antique Aurum, Antique Colourcore and Antique Natural Wood. They also market door skin under brand name Beautique, Texas, Micro Touch, Antique Natural Wood and Door Touch.

Specialisation in textured laminated, company has diverse range with 1152 designs in laminates and 429 designs in door skins, that meets customer fancy.

"Ambition Mica" enjoys a unique brand identity as the market leader, which offerings that are considered industry Benchmarks. "Ambition Mica" has come up with an object of new design solution for interiors and architects to inspire their idea with a commitment to set new trend in interior and furniture world to yield unexpected results. "Ambition Mica" offers simplicity with carefully chosen Textures, Wood grains series, Metals, Colors etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Ambition Mica Limited, Shop No 10 Ground Floor, Raghav Residenct Naroda, Ahmedabad - 382330

faqs.question: What is the Ambition Mica FPO?
faqs.answer:
Ambition Mica FPO is a SME FPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹42 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The FPO opens on November 16, 2017, and closes on November 21, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the FPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ambition Mica FPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ambition Mica FPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ambition Mica FPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ambition Mica FPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ambition Mica FPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ambition Mica FPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ambition Mica FPO opens on November 16, 2017 and closes on November 21, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ambition Mica FPO?
faqs.answer: Ambition Mica FPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ambition Mica FPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ambition Mica FPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
